zh: 他告别了家人，然后上了船。

en: He said good-bye to the family.
He took leave of his family and got on board the plane for New York.
zh: 他向家人告别，然后登上了去纽约的飞机。

en: No sooner had he met his family than he burst into tears.
zh: 他一见到家人就 burst into tears (突然哭了起来)。

en: He prepared his family for the move.
zh: 他为家人的搬迁做好了准备。

en: He sat surrounded by his family.
He provided food and clothes for his family.
zh: 他为家人提供食物和衣服。

en: He traveled to Hawaii with the family.
zh: 他和家人一起去夏威夷旅行。

en: He lives apart from his family.
He didn't like being separated from his family.
He had the maid sweep his room.
zh: 他让女佣打扫他的房间。

en: He ran away from home.
He was not a financial burden on her.
zh: 他没有成为她的经济负担。

en: He deals in furniture.
He succeeded to the family business.
He advertised his house for sale.
zh: 他登广告出售他的房子。

en: He put up his house for sale.
I hear that he sold his house.
zh: 我听说他卖掉了他的房子。

en: He looked into the possibility of buying a house.
zh: 他调查了买房子的可能性。

en: He can afford to buy a house, to say nothing of a car.
zh: 他买得起房子，更不用说汽车了。

en: He was looking into the possibility of buying a house.
zh: 他当时正在调查买房子的可能性。

en: He has just left home.
He didn't want to part with his house.
zh: 他不想和他的房子分开。

en: He had to part with his house.
zh: 他不得不卖掉他的房子。

en: He bought the lot with a view to building a house on it.
zh: 他买下这块地是为了在上面盖房子。

en: He bought the land with the plan to build a house on it.
zh: 他买了这块地，计划在上面盖房子。

en: He bought the land for the purpose of building his house on it.
zh: 他买下这块地是为了在上面盖房子。

en: He has bought a lot in the suburbs with a view to building a house.
zh: 他为了盖房子，在郊区买了一块地。

en: He bought the land for the purpose of building a house on it.
zh: 他买这块地是为了在上面盖房子。

en: He sold his house for 50000 dollars.
zh: 他以五万美元的价格卖掉了他的房子。

en: He has left his family.
He left home.
He walked home.
He had to walk all of ten miles to his home.
zh: 他不得不走了整整十英里才到家。

en: He is an honor to his family.
He made over the interior of his house.
zh: 他重新装修了他的房子内部。

en: He checked the durability of the house before buying it.
zh: 他在买房前检查了房子的耐用性。

en: He cleared the road in front of his house of snow.
zh: 他清理了房子门前的积雪。

en: He looked about the house.
zh: 他在房子里四处看了看。

en: He built a fence around his house.
zh: 他在他的房子周围建了一个栅栏。

en: He lives near my house.
He had his roof damaged.
He mailed a letter home.
He made for home.
He must be at home. I see his car in his garage.
zh: 他一定在家。我看到他的车在他的车库里。

en: He called at the baker's on the way home.
zh: 他在回家的路上顺便去了面包店。

en: He reads 10 books when he returns to the house.
zh: 他每次回到家都会读十本书。

en: He was worn out when he got home.
zh: 他到家时已经筋疲力尽了。

en: He was exhausted when he got home.
zh: 他到家时已经精疲力竭了。

en: He was bursting to go home.
He was burning to go home.
He insured his house against fire.
zh: 他给他的房子买了火灾保险。

en: He tried to force an entrance into the house.
He went back home.
He isn't at home, is he?
He was at home.
He is relaxing in his home.
He got thrown out of the house.
He tore out of the house.
He was seen going out of the house.
He had to carry many loads from the house to station.
zh: 他不得不把许多货物从房子运到车站。

en: He was seen to come out of the house.
zh: 有人看到他从房子里出来。

en: He stayed in Nagano throughout the summer.
zh: 整个夏天他都待在长野。

en: He waters the flowers every day in summer.
He hates wearing a tie during the summer heat.
zh: 他讨厌在夏天炎热的时候打领带。

en: He doesn't like the heat of the summer.
He organized a summer rock festival.
zh: 他组织了一个夏季摇滚音乐节。

en: He likes swimming in summer.
He likes swimming in the summer.
He would go to out for a long walk in summer.
zh: 夏天他会出去长途散步。

en: He put up a notice about the change in price.
zh: 他张贴了关于价格变动的通知。

en: He values honor above anything else.
He had to lead a miserable life for many years.
zh: 他不得不过了多年的悲惨生活。

en: He had to part from her owing to unavoidable circumstances many years ago.
zh: 多年前，由于不可避免的情况，他不得不和她分离。

en: He came back after many years.
He looked as if he hadn't eaten for days.
zh: 他看起来好像几天没吃饭了。

en: He often goes without food for days.
He had to go without food for days.
zh: 他不得不饿了好几天肚子。

en: He interrupted the speaker with frequent questions.
zh: 他经常提问，打断了发言者。

en: He looked back at us many times and walked away.
zh: 他多次回头看我们，然后走开了。

en: He tried again and again, but didn't succeed.
zh: 他一次又一次地尝试，但没有成功。

en: He has been to Europe many times.
He knocked at the door again and again, but there was no answer.
zh: 他一次又一次地敲门，但没有人应答。

en: He knocked on the door again and again, but there was no answer.
zh: 他一次又一次地敲门，但没有人应答。

en: He tried several times, but failed.
zh: 他尝试了几次，但失败了。

en: He has had several goes at marriage.
He tried to give up smoking several times, but failed.
zh: 他几次想戒烟，但都失败了。

en: He dictated several letters to his secretary.
zh: 他给他的秘书口述了好几封信。

en: He is writing to some friends of his.
zh: 他正在给他的几个朋友写信。

en: There is nothing wrong with him.
Where does he live?
Where did he go?
He has dozens of English books.
He has dozens of books about Japan.
zh: 他有很多关于日本的书。

en: He kept waiting for hours and hours.
zh: 他不停地等了好几个小时。

en: He would sit and look at the sea for hours.
zh: 他会坐在那里看几个小时的海。

en: He will often sit and look at the sea for hours.
zh: 他经常会坐在那里看几个小时的海。

en: He has been driving for hours.
zh: 他已经开了好几个小时的车了。

en: When did he say he would come?
What time did he say he'd come?
When do you expect him back?
zh: 你预计他什么时候回来？

en: What time did he ask for your response?
zh: 他要求你什么时候回复？

en: He is the kind of man who cannot do anything in moderation, but always goes to extremes.
zh: 他这个人做什么事情都不能适可而止，总是走极端。

en: He went on reading the book as if nothing had happened.
zh: 他继续读书，好像什么都没发生过一样。

en: He went on talking as though nothing had happened.
zh: 他继续说个不停，好像什么都没发生过一样。

en: He has a negative attitude to everything.
zh: 他对什么事情都持消极态度。

en: He never sticks to anything very long.
zh: 他做什么事情都不能坚持很久。

en: He is very thorough about everything.
zh: 他做每件事情都非常彻底。

en: He is not pleased with anything.
He had his own way over everything.
zh: 他在所有事情上都随心所欲。

en: He will have his own way in everything.
zh: 他会在所有事情上都随心所欲。

en: He is always taking his own way in anything.
zh: 他总是随心所欲地做任何事情。

en: He can't stick to anything very long.
zh: 他做什么事情都不能坚持很久。

en: What is he aiming at?
He reflected on what answer to make.
What is he running after?
What is he talking about? It just doesn't make sense.
zh: 他在说什么？简直莫名其妙。

en: What did he look up?
What is he after?
What is he up to?
What was he up to?
He makes good in everything he does.
zh: 他做什么事情都很成功。

en: He is successful in everything.
zh: 他做任何事情都很成功。

en: What is he so angry about?
He is passive in everything.
zh: 他对什么事情都很被动。

en: He was at a loss what to do.
What does he mean to do?
What does he intend to do?
What does he plan to do?
Whatever he takes up, he gets soon tired of it.
zh: 无论他做什么，他很快就会厌倦。

en: What is he doing?
What is he?
What does he do?
What do you think he is?
What does he want to do?
Did he propose any solutions?
zh: 他提出什么解决方案了吗？

en: He seemed vague about what he wanted to do.
zh: 他对于自己想做什么，似乎含糊其辞。

en: He hasn't left any message.
He never seemed to accomplish anything.
zh: 他似乎从来没有完成过任何事情。

en: He will not accomplish anything.
He didn't say anything.
He says that he saw nothing. However, I don't believe what he says is the truth.
zh: 他说他什么也没看见。但是，我不相信他说的是实话。

en: He did nothing wrong.
He did nothing bad.
He was smiling as if nothing had happened to him.
zh: 他面带微笑，好像什么都没发生过一样。

en: He has nothing to do.
He preferred working to doing nothing.
zh: 他宁愿工作也不愿无所事事。

en: He would often sit for hours doing nothing.
zh: 他经常一坐就是几个小时，什么也不做。

en: He would sit for hours doing nothing.
zh: 他会一坐几个小时，什么也不做。

en: He would often sit here for hours doing nothing.
zh: 他经常会在这里一坐几个小时，什么也不做。

en: Everything seems to go right with him.
He is good for nothing.
He found no difficulty in solving the problem.
zh: 他觉得解决这个问题毫无困难。

en: I am a little bit afraid that he will not prepare anything because I have not seen a presentation of his with presentation material.
zh: 我有点担心他什么都不准备，因为我没见过他用演示材料做过演示。

en: He has no redeeming traits.
There is nothing to him.
He gave away his entire fortune to an old friend's daughter, and expected nothing in return.
zh: 他把全部财产都赠送给了一个老朋友的女儿，不求任何回报。

en: He had no difficulty swimming across the river.
zh: 他毫不费力地游过了河。

en: He returned home without telling us.
How tall he is!
How noisy he is!
What a good swimmer he is!
What rude language he uses!
He was at a loss for a word.
He did not know what to say.
How he eats!
What a fool he is!
What a good tennis player he is!
He managed to get home before dark.
zh: 他设法在天黑前赶回了家。

en: He was able to get home before dark.
zh: 他设法在天黑前赶回了家。

en: He managed to be on time for class.
He managed to escape.
I wonder what he will say.
Why is he busy?
What a good speaker of Japanese he is!
How strong he is!
He talks as if he knew everything.
zh: 他说话好像什么都知道似的。

en: He talks as if he knows everything.
zh: 他说话的口气好像什么都懂一样。

en: He thinks he knows everything but, as a matter of face, he is very ignorant.
zh: 他以为他什么都知道，但实际上，他非常无知。

en: He talks as though he knew everything.
zh: 他说话的口气好像他什么都知道一样。

en: He has a tendency toward exaggeration.
He didn't trust his brother enough to confide in him.
zh: 他不信任他的兄弟，所以没有向他吐露心声。

en: He likes to do everything for himself.
zh: 他喜欢所有事情都自己做。

en: He was no better than a yes-man.
zh: 他只不过是个唯唯诺诺的人。

en: He sees everything in terms of money.
He is an all-round man.
Nothing comes amiss to him.
He was able to do everything at will.
zh: 他能够随心所欲地做任何事。

en: He wants everything his own way.
zh: 他凡事都要按自己的方式来。

en: He sometimes loses his temper for nothing.
zh: 他有时会无缘无故地发脾气。

en: He tends to do everything to excess.
zh: 他倾向于凡事都做得过头。

en: He is a type of a person who calls a spade a spade.
He understands everything right on the spot.
He pretends to know everything.
What a nice fellow he is!
He has been wandering over Europe for months.
zh: 他已经在欧洲漫游好几个月了。

en: He wants something cold to drink.
He went about the store looking for something to buy.
zh: 他在店里转来转去，想找点东西买。

en: He seems to be worried about something.
He was afraid about what was going to happen.
zh: 他害怕即将发生的事情。

en: He described exactly what happened.
zh: 他准确地描述了所发生的事情。

en: He seems to have something on his mind.
I think he is planning something.
zh: 我觉得他正在计划着什么。

en: He needs something to drink.
It occurred to me that he was trying to conceal something.
zh: 我突然想到他试图隐瞒什么。

en: When he begins to do anything, he devotes himself to it.
zh: 他一旦开始做任何事情，就会全身心投入。

en: He's mumbling something.
He is good for something.
Does he do any sports?
He is up to some monkey business.
He knows little of mathematics, still less of chemistry.
zh: 他对数学懂得不多，对化学就更少了。

en: He hardly studies chemistry.
He devoted himself to the study of chemistry.
He is poor at chemistry.
He is haughty to his juniors.
He looked down at the valley below.
He has worked his way up from the bottom.
zh: 他从底层一步一个脚印地做起来的。

en: He is a man of musical ability.
zh: 他是一个有音乐天赋的人。

en: He is going to the concert.
It appears that he is a musician.
He didn't arrive until the concert was over.
zh: 他直到音乐会结束才到。

en: He has established himself as a musician.
zh: 他已经确立了他作为音乐家的地位。

en: He's not in the top grade as a musician.
zh: 作为一名音乐家，他不是顶尖的。

en: He went to Austria for the purpose of studying music.
zh: 他去奥地利是为了学习音乐。

en: He wrote a letter, listening to music.
zh: 他一边听音乐一边写信。

en: He went to Italy in order to study music.
zh: 他去意大利是为了学习音乐。

en: He was listening to music.
He settled down in his armchair to listen to the music.
zh: 他安顿下来坐在扶手椅上听音乐。

en: He diverted himself by listening to music.
He is playing music.
He likes both music and sports.
zh: 他既喜欢音乐又喜欢运动。

en: He's no judge of music.
He has gone to Italy to study music.
zh: 他去意大利学习音乐了。

en: He has a remarkable aptitude for music.
He went to Italy for the purpose of studying music.
zh: 他去意大利是为了学习音乐。

en: He applied himself to the study of music.
He is absorbed in music.
He is mad about music.
He is interested in music.
He is given to music.
He seemed to be very keen on music.
zh: 他似乎对音乐非常热衷。

en: He likes sports as well as music.
He belongs to the music club.
He likes not only music but sports.
zh: 他不仅喜欢音乐，还喜欢运动。

en: He likes not only music but sports as well.
zh: 他不仅喜欢音乐，还喜欢运动。

en: He is very fond of music.
He has an ear for music.
He likes music very much.
He is a great lover of music.
zh: 他是一个伟大的音乐爱好者。

en: He has a great fondness for music.
He likes music a lot.
He loves music.
He really likes music a lot.
He can move quietly and quickly.
zh: 他可以安静而迅速地移动。

en: He is a man of moderate opinions.
zh: 他是一个意见温和的人。

en: He embraced his son warmly.
zh: 他热情地拥抱了他的儿子。

en: He was far from thankful to his former teacher.
zh: 他对他的前任老师一点也不感激。

en: He was not at all thankful to his former teacher.
zh: 他对他的前任老师一点也不感激。

en: He resented being called a coward.
He is nothing more than a coward.
He is more shy than timid.
zh: 他与其说是胆小，不如说是害羞。

en: He was accused of cowardice.
He cleared the roof of snow.
zh: 他清除了屋顶上的积雪。

en: He fell down from the roof, and what made the matter worse, broke his leg.
zh: 他从屋顶上摔了下来，更糟糕的是，他还摔断了腿。

en: He fell from the roof head over heels.
zh: 他从屋顶上头朝下摔了下来。

en: It is said that he is a billionaire.
He put off his trip to Okinawa.
zh: 他推迟了去冲绳的旅行。

en: He lives in that yellow house.
zh: 他住在那个黄色的房子里。

en: Ogai is his favorite author.
zh: 鸥外是他最喜欢的作家。

en: He was more than a king.
He carries himself with the majesty of a king.
He was to succeed to the throne.
He will succeed to the throne.
He is of royal blood.
He made up a story about the king.
zh: 他编造了一个关于国王的故事。

en: He was named after the king.
He was beaten black and blue.
He was none other than the king.
He commutes from Yokohama to Tokyo by train.
zh: 他每天坐火车从横滨到东京上下班。

en: He fell flat on the floor.
He is influential.
He gave three wrong answers.
He took a taxi both ways.
He played his trump card.
He ought to take good care of his wife.
zh: 他应该好好照顾他的妻子。

en: He is twice as heavy as his wife.
zh: 他的体重是他妻子的两倍。

en: He can cook as well as his wife.
zh: 他和他妻子一样会做饭。

en: He wanted to be woken up early by his wife.
zh: 他想让他的妻子早点叫醒他。

en: He has been tamed by his wife.
zh: 他已经被他的妻子驯服了。

en: He is seeing one of his secretaries behind his wife's back.
zh: 他在背着他的妻子和他的一个秘书约会。

en: He is no match for his wife.
He got his wife to mend his shirt.
zh: 他让他的妻子帮他补衬衫。

en: He may have argued with his wife, but he can't have hit her.
zh: 他可能和他的妻子吵架了，但他不可能打她。

en: He was caught off guard when his wife announced they were going to have a baby.
zh: 当他的妻子宣布他们要生孩子时，他措手不及。

en: He was afraid of his wife.
He is worried whether his wife can get on with his mother.
zh: 他担心他的妻子是否能和他的母亲相处。

en: He vindicated his honor.
He is said to have something to do with the political scandal.
zh: 据说他和这起政治丑闻有关。

en: He took a pencil in his hand.
He put down the pencil on the desk.
He has a habit of sucking his pencil.
He has two pencils; one is long and the other short.
zh: 他有两支铅笔；一支长，一支短。
